meta.article_title: How to Play Doubles with a Much Stronger Player

play-doubles-stronger-player.probleme: Playing doubles with a much stronger player

debutant.nom: Serve low and short, with backspin or no-spin
debutant.description: Practice in advance to serve short, low serves. Stopping the opposing team from making strong returns allows the stronger partner to dominate.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Serve low and short, with backspin or no-spin
exercices_complementaires.description: Practice in advance to serve short, low serves. Stopping the opposing team from making strong returns allows the stronger partner to dominate.

metriques_progression.targets: Serve short, low serves with backspin or no-spin
